response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss the details further.", "product_price": 1150000}
